data.title: Arvest Bank
data.meta_description: Angel was born in Venezuela and made Oklahoma his home since 2015. He loves to spend time with his nephew David and his niece Lucy. Angel is fluent in English and Spanish* and has a vast amount of knowledge in Mortgage Lending. As an Associate Mortgage Lender, he has a passion for helping his clients get into the home of their dreams. He loves to work with each home buyer to help them find the best option available for their home loan. He has a willingness to help anyone, and his customers are his top priority. Contact him today!
data.text:
Angel was born in Venezuela and made Oklahoma his home since 2015. He loves to spend time with his nephew David and his niece Lucy. Angel is fluent in English and Spanish* and has a vast amount of knowledge in Mortgage Lending. As an Associate Mortgage Lender, he has a passion for helping his clients get into the home of their dreams. He loves to work with each home buyer to help them find the best option available for their home loan. He has a willingness to help anyone, and his customers are his top priority. Contact him today! He would love to meet with you and discuss the loan program that would be the best fit for you and your lifestyle.

*Arvest Bank values your business. Arvest employees communicate primarily in English. While some Arvest employees have proficiency in Spanish, Arvest cannot provide interpretation services and offers no representations or warranties as to the accuracy of employee communications in Spanish. You may either provide your own interpreter or proceed in English. If you choose to provide your own interpreter, then he or she must be 18 years of age or older.
